participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emma enjoys music and family time. She is grounded and seeks normalcy in her life while preparing for motherhood.
participant_1.background: I try to live my life as normal as possible, but I have to be more careful now that I'm carrying twins. I play the guitar to accompany my singing. I love getting my favorite coffee from Starbucks after a long day at the lab. I watch Jimmy Fallon's show every night. I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Expressive and imaginative, Liam loves to create and share his artistic side. He values creativity and enjoys a hands-on approach to life.
participant_2.background: I love to express myself through my costumes and love the energy of live music. My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place. I'm not too concerned with social media, I'd rather focus on my writing. I loved spending summers in the country with my cousins and pets. I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to express myself through my costumes and love the energy of live music.
Do you like to sing? I sing and play the guitar to accompany myself.
Yes, I love to sing! I wish I could play an instrument.
It's not too hard to learn. I took lessons when I was a kid.
That's cool. I'm not much of a musician. I prefer to express myself through my costumes.
I like that. What kind of costumes do you like to make?
I like to make costumes for different events. I made a really cool costume for a Halloween party last year.
That sounds awesome. I'd love to see it sometime.
Sure, I can show you a picture of it.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. We go camping and fishing a lot in the summer.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love spending time with my family too.
It's the best way to relax and have fun.
I agree. I'm glad we have similar interests
